item.title: Option
item.dc:creator: @imantai imantai
item.description:
@imantai wrote:

So ive added this to my Npc Aubury

[code]case 3:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Do you want to buy some runes?”, 4885);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

  case 4:
    sendFrame171(1, 2465);
    sendFrame171(0, 2468);
    sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
    sendFrame126("Yes please!", 2461);
    sendFrame126("No thanks i would like to go to essences mine", 2462);
    sendFrame164(2459);
    NpcDialogueSend = true;
    break;

[/code]

Ok so when he click no thanks i would like to go to essences mine how would i add teleport toy or w/e…

Read full topic
